name: Bleeding Cells
description:
You are one of the deathless, and you have already confronted Achnubis but failed. Now you must rebuild your strength and prepare to face him again.

To access his room, you must acquire keys, skills, and fight several foes. To ultimately escape this terrible planet, keep an eye on your stamina and health, activate checkpoints, and master the fight.

Platformer game project made for Toronto Film School Term1.
Special thanks to my teacher Ahmet Kokulu.

Controls:
- AD to move left and right

-W to jump

-S to crouch and slide

-LMB to attack

-Shift to roll (has i frames)
